items.sentence: It would be better if you didn't come back here.
Tom only does that if other people are watching.
The firm has changed hands at least three times.
For some reason, we seem to be losing customers.
I wish that I could lose weight and keep it off.
Why didn't you tell Tom that we're just friends?
We sat on the bench and had a long conversation.
What makes you think that you're better than me?
I'll look up the location of the town on my map.
The car broke down after half an hour's driving.
